title: Thunderbird email
content: my email is not synced to my phone or my other computer on my new Win11 computer . Yahoo is but not Thunderbird . I have to mark as read or delete messages that have been read on other devices when I get to this Win 11 machine . Thanks ! Ken
creator: kobark

title: Problem with email in outbox
content:
Can someone advise please, I am using an android tablet and have had no problems with thunderbird until recently. I send and receive email from multiple accounts, but occasionally it will stick the email in the outbox and nothing I do will send it.

The email address is correct because if I go to yahoo it will send the message.

It appears to be totally random from any of the six accounts I use. I have deleted each account, reinstalled thunderbird. No difference. I can send mail it goes yo outbox, send another and it gets sent. ??

I am getting to the stage where I am going to abandon thunderbird because I think email is sent and its not.
creator: catweazle883311

Don't know what I changed to make that disappear, but I want it back!

title: Authentication Problem with Yahoo email account
content:
I changed my yahoo password and can longer access this account in Thunderbird.

Now when I sign in to Thunderbird I get 'Edge To Many requests'

Unfortunately I deleted the yahoo user name and password in Thunderbird Password/ Saved Logins thinking Yahoo might automatically ask for my new password when re-starting Thunderbird

Can somebody help please.

Many thanks

title: pop3 leaving emails on server still even though this option is 'unchecked' ?
content: i have pop3 account and unchecked leave on server - but greyed and checked out is a 'leave for a maximum' which i have as 1 day, there doesnt seem to be an option to uncheck this? I dont want them on the server which is why i chose pop account. yet when i open web account, the emails already downloaded using the pop account are still there even thoug they were downloaded days ago. Why is this and how do stop this? is there a 'leave copy on server' box to uncheck that I am missing? i want to use pop to remove from server and just use locally but its not doing what i thought it would, which is remove from setver. Also it keeps repeating downloading from years ago so I was hoping that when the server synced it would stop downloading the ones it has already (mulitple times) Help figuring out what to do appreciated.
creator: brew
